content:
I am curious which of the CCDA 2.1 Documents are actually being generated. I heard today on the Examples Task Force call that Transfer Summary is not currently being done by vendors. Are there others? Care Plan
Consultation Note
Continuity of Care Document (CCD)
Diagnostic Imaging Reports (DIR)
Discharge Summary
History and Physical (H&P)
Operative Note
Procedure Note
Progress Note
Referral Note
Transfer Summary*
Unstructured Document
